Literature.Title: Synthesis of cyclotetrapeptide analogues of c-PLAI and evaluation of their antimicrobial properties
Literature.Author: Maharani R, Napitupulu OI, Dirgantara JM, Hidayat AT, Sumiarsa D, Harneti D, Nurlelasari, Supratman U, Fukase K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 11229(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 2357(MIC=250µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=125µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=125µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=125µg/ml),Trichophyton mentagrophytes(MIC=125µg/ml)
